description:
The story begins with the Hundred, the only weapon that can counter the mysterious Savage life form attacking Earth. To become a Slayer (master of military arts) who wields this Hundred, the main character Hayato Kisaragi successfully enrolls in the marine academy city ship Little Garden. However …

"I wanted to meet you, Hayato!!"
"W–who are you…?"

Hayato feels a strange yet familiar sense of incongruity towards Emil Crossford, his roommate who somehow knows him from somewhere. On top of that, as soon as he enters the school, he is challenged to a duel by the "Queen" (the school's most powerful Slayer) Claire Harvey!

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Incest
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations between characters who are related by blood.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Cosmic Horror
tags.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

tags.name: Cannibalism
tags.description: Prominently features the act of consuming another member of the same species as food.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

node.description: In March 2010, she graduated from Tokyo Animation College.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mayuge1017)

A Tokyo Zoukei University graduate, he's one of the leading digital animators in the industry, with good character animation and catchy effects.

He is a "follower" of [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047/). In his university days, he was in the same circle as [Ryuu Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/133512/). They still have a good relationship and work with each other a lot. 

He is also a good friend of [Takahito Sakazume](https://anilist.co/staff/131945/), the two working often as a "two man production team."

Enokido is mainly known for his work on the Fate franchise, being both the action director for [Fate/Apocrypha](https://anilist.co/anime/98035/) and having directed the majority of the [Fate/Grand Order Commercials](https://anilist.co/anime/101184/).

**Doujin Circle:** PANDANIKU

Friends with co-worker and fellow Nitroplus artist [Namaniku ATK](https://anilist.co/staff/132764/Namaniku-ATK).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/panda_ookuma) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/363775)
